<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cognitive Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3316)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=808" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your mind becomes clear, but physical matters seem ephemeral. 

**Benefit** You gain an item bonus to Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, and Society checks and all checks to Recall Knowledge. Your critical failures on [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) checks become failures instead. 

**Drawback** You take a –2 penalty to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) checks, and [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) checks. You can carry 2 less Bulk than normal before becoming [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=70), and the maximum Bulk you can carry is reduced by 4.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</traits>
